item.title: Frustrated MSPs demand Scottish Government files in Alex Salmond inquiry
item.description:
https://www.heraldscotland.com/news/18504262.frustrated-msps-demand-scottish-government-files-alex-salmond-inquiry/

The Herald reports:

MSPs investigating a botched sexual misconduct probe into Alex Salmond have demanded the urgent release of Scottish Government files after becoming fed up with excuses.

The Holyrood inquiry into the Governmentâ€™s mishandling of the 2018 in-house investigation made its anger plain after officials appeared to hide behind the Covid crisis.
